message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000. I think it's a fair price considering its worth to me, and I believe you'll find it's a great investment.

Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. While I appreciate the value of the product, $20000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to offer $8000 for it, but I'm only willing to go up to $9000.  Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand that $20000 is a bit steep, but I'm not willing to sell it for $8000 either. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $14000. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me and the value it can bring to you.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down on your price, but $14000 is still too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $10000 for it, which is the absolute maximum I can afford.  If this isn't acceptable, I'll have to go with another seller.

Hi Bob, I understand that $10000 is your maximum budget, but I'm not willing to sell it for that low. I'm willing to compromise further and offer it to you for $12500. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me and the value it can bring to you.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $12500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to offer you $11000 for the product.  This is a fair price, considering the value you've placed on it and the fact that I'm close to my maximum. Let me know if you're willing to accept this offer.

Hi Bob, I understand that $11000 is your best offer, but I'm still not willing to sell it for that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer it to you for $12750. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me and the value it can bring to you.
